name: Out of Time (itch) (renauld)
description:
When space isnt a option try time. Travel through diferents eras of time confined in one cave. Find the way out.

Help our Hero Jorge and his drone Gama to get back to their time in this 2d plataformer.

Made for the Indie Tales Jam.

Tutorial: 

W,A,D = Movement

Space(hold) = long jump

Space(tap) = smaljump

S = Look down

Mouse = Shoot/Dialog

Ghost have 3 lives and the bullet sprite is bugged*

I'm sorry for the state of the game, i was literally out of time and forgot to add the some effects and replace one obviosly wrong sprite. But i hope you can enjoy it any way. Have fun! and thank you for trying. :)
